subject: AI & Agents
title: Watermarking AI-Generated Content
description: A fast breakdown of Watermarking AI-Generated Content for builders.

hook.text: Is this photo real or AI-generated? A hidden watermark could tell you instantly.

buildup.text: Watermarking embeds invisible signals in generated content to prove AI origin.

discovery.text: Text watermarks bias token selection in statistically detectable ways.

twist.text: Watermarks can be removed by paraphrasing text or re-encoding images. It's an arms race.

climax.text: C2PA and SynthID aim to become standards for AI content provenance tracking.

punchline.text: Invisible marks for an invisible problem.

quiz.question: How can text watermarks be defeated?
